channel.title: Making a client
channel.description: Hello, I know I am new and none of you know me. But, I always play on private servers and clients and they get boring. I want it to be my way. I wanna make my own client. I was trying to and I made a great picture for the client. I'm just trying to figure all this out. I need some help with the environmental variables and making the source your using connect to your server .no-ip. I am trying to find a pre-made source. Like a client that is already a server. Just want to change picture, name, and a few things here and there. Such as shops, npcs, and items. I know I can change that stuff, that won't take me very long. I am also planning on editing items, such as making obby rings into ninja stars. And special armor and weapons. I know that stuff is difficult and will take me probably a year. So to start off, can someone that is currently running a client. Open it and let me use it to edit and such as. [img]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn89/jocksta227/ninjasruscopy.png[/img]

item.title: Making a client
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

WHAT THE FUCK.

WHY DOES http://www.mopar.com/ NOT HAVE ANY PRIVATE SERVER CLINETS???

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

jocksta227:

then why the hell is the title of the site MOPARisthebest.com and why are all the topics related to MOPARSCAPE.

Because there are an abnormally high ratio of retards like you.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

jocksta227:

then why the hell is the title of the site MOPARisthebest.com and why are all the topics related to MOPARSCAPE.

Because you obviously fail to see the lack of a connection; Mopar is an aftermarket auto parts manufacturer, and this site has nothing to do with moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

When you were posting in this board, did you not notice the titles of the boards? Never, at any point, was MoparScape mentioned.

Moparisthebest.com > [b]RuneScape2[/b] development > Questions and talk about [b]RS2 client hacking[/b] > Making a client

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client
item.dc:creator: @jocksta227 jocksta227
item.description:
@jocksta227 wrote:

Hello, I know I am new and none of you know me. But, I always play on private servers and clients and they get boring. I want it to be my way. I wanna make my own client. I was trying to and I made a great picture for the client. I’m just trying to figure all this out. I need some help with the environmental variables and making the source your using connect to your server .no-ip. I am trying to find a pre-made source. Like a client that is already a server. Just want to change picture, name, and a few things here and there. Such as shops, npcs, and items. I know I can change that stuff, that won’t take me very long. I am also planning on editing items, such as making obby rings into ninja stars. And special armor and weapons. I know that stuff is difficult and will take me probably a year. So to start off, can someone that is currently running a client. Open it and let me use it to edit and such as.
